dc_title_s: A new and accurate map of the present war in North America
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: London. "Universal mag. J. Hinton, Newgate Street." Historic Maps copy accompanied by article from Universal magazine for May, 1757, with title: An account of the country, at present the seat of war in North-America, and of the original inhabitants of it, generally called Indians. Illustrated with a new and accurate map of the present seat of war in North-America, finely coloured; includes "Explanation of the map."
dc_subject_sm: New England—History—French and Indian War, 1754-1763—Maps—Early works to 1800
